name: supreme-overlord

effect.scarlet_violet: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

short_effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.
